title: Social media & Character from a film

singleItemContent: Do you like using social media ?
Do you think your friends use too much social media?
Do you want to work in social media?Why?
Describe a character from a film
What character it is who acted the character
And explain whether you lik this character
Is it interesting to be an actor/actress?
What can children learn from acting?
Why do children like special costume?
What are the differences between actors/actresses who earn much and those who earn little?
What are the differences between acting in a theatreand in a film?
